caption: They use organic fruit and it is less or comparable to the non-chain places that are not using organic! Love this place. Everything feels good when you drink it. Cant wait to try their sandwiches.
I felt appreciated for coming in, my service was quick and with a smile, and my food was prepared perfectly. Nothing was just thrown together,  and I appreciate when the food looks like the picture!
Although the product is good the service was terrible.  3 people behind the counter did not  know what they were doing. The box with my food was full of grease marks. It took extremely too long.

I ordered on the app and called when I arrived and a lovely someone brought it out right away. I love that I can enjoy healthy meals like this without risking going indoors during a pandemic. I highly recommend this location, too.
The staff really goes above and beyond and the smoothies and juices are amazing!
This place is great! Love the 1 day 6 juice cleanse! Always fresh and actually yummy!
Love this place this. The Chocolate one smoothie is my favourite and I must add that the service is top notch. I am not a regular.
Employees are always pleasant. The smoothies/food is always fresh :). Love it!
I went in today and the avocado toast and smoothie was so good and service was great.  will definitely come back (:
Healthy, fresh food; kind service with a smile; plenty of gluten-free options.
Friendly service. Clean and healthy offerings. Great experience. I got ‘The Youthful’ and loved it! Will be back for sure.
The food and juices are always yummy, but make sure you have 20 spare minutes to wait on your smoothie or food to be prepared! A little slow-paced but kind staff.
Way expensive. Buy your own juicer and do it yourself. However, out and about it's ok. Better than fast-food...
Fantastic juice shop! Always tastes great and fresh  and I just love that it’s organic. I’m a frequent flyer!
Nice and clean restaurant. My first time was pleasant!

An absolute joke of an operation. 19 minutes we stood there for an orange juice. When we asked for our money back we were told “only managers can do that” and were given a card that says “the next one is on us”...now why would I ever want to come back to a store that takes 19 minutes to make an orange juice? If you’re going to hire kids to run your operation at least have an adult there to supervise said kids!!!
Overpriced and lacks flavor. Spend 70 dollars on 3 juices and 3 toasts.
Fantastic, fresh, and clean juice!
Great service.  Excellent product.  Best source for a quality cleanse in the Alpharetta/ Milton area.
Great juice bar, friendly staff

We ordered online coming out of the gym to pick up on our way home. When we got there it wasn’t ready. We waited. After five minutes I asked when they would be done. The girl told me the juicer was broken and it would be another 15 minutes. I saw other people leave with Juice’s and after 10 minutes asked how long it would take.  She asked what I had and said ‘oh, I’ll make them now’.  Took us 30 minutes from ordering to getting our drinks. Not ordering online at this place anymore!
Love coming in for lunch or afternoon pick me up. It’s hard to find organic juices at other juice bars. Great organic products and wonderful staff at Clean Juice!
Everything and everyone is always great!
Love this place. One of the very very very few juicing places that makes your juice upon order. The mixtures are delicious
Also ways fresh and delicious.

I write this, not because I will not continue to purchase from this location but because I want those around, who may have more time than I do, to know what to expect. I visit this location once or twice a week.  First of all, the staff will be hit or miss. Expect to be treated as if you’re a nuisance if you try to order a not-so-common latte or bowl. Keep in mind that you will have to check the ingredient(s) on the app to compare with the item that you get in order to ensure that it was made correctly - I have had to tell an employee to re-make a smoothie because there was no apple in it. He argued at first but confirmed after looking at the menu and apologized. I appreciated that he apologized. I had to ask an employee to re-make a latte with the sweetener in the recipe (per the app) I was familiar with how it was supposed to taste. I received a dirty look for asking for it to be re-made. I had to go back in to Clean Juice to get a different lid because the lid did not properly fit the latte cup so it spilled all over the place. Fortunately, I was in the parking lot.  Most recently, what encouraged me to write this was how contentious Mariah was on Monday afternoon when I tried to order off the Winter Menu as if it were my fault that it was not prepared. I got a notification from the app that the Winter Menu was available, the sign outside advertised it and the Winter Menu was physically advertised on the lit-up menu inside. Mariah unpleasantly said it was not prepped. She said “none of us were given any instruction on the Winter Menu.” She said “I can make you a latte because that is pre-made.” I thought it was fresh to order? She was noticeably aggravated. She did not apologize. The owner was nowhere to be found. She had to call the owner for instruction. I tried not to take it personal because she seemed overwhelmed. I did not think it should be demonstrated in her tone or her facial expression. All I simply did was respond to the advertisement by trying to spend money there. I told her that it was advertised on the app and that I got a text message about it. She abruptly tried to make an excuse by being condescending, saying  “well, yeah, today is the first day” so does that mean that True Food across the street can say “we have no food prepped, excuse us, it is our first day”?  I write this for the consumer not for the owner to improve. I have mentioned this experience to the owner; However, I live across the street so this is the most convenient place for me to get a nutritional latte.
Literally one of the best smoothies I’ve ever had. nice people nice atmosphere and the best smoothies.. thank you so much

I was recently in town for a sales meeting and could not pass up the opportunity to stop in to clean juice. Their açaí bowls are to die for especially the beach bowl.  All of my colleagues loved their salads and smoothies and we even took juices to go! Thanks Clean Juice.  We will be back.

This place is amazing!  Every time I pass by I need to stop in.  The staff and owner are great people.  Love the nutty bowl and the coffee one smoothie.  I will be trying the cleansing juices next. Five stars! I highly recommend if you are looking for a healthy alternative.

My wife ordered a bowl, I went next door and got a burger at burger 21. Got it, ate it and watched some football. 50 minutes later my wife still did not get her bowl. There are other places in the area that are nearby and offer the same bowls and smoothies. Not enough staff or prepped materials at this place!

I recommend you run - don't walk - from Clean Juice. Our daughter got extremely ill after eating a salad and having a smoothie at Clean Juice - throwing up, diarrhea, and extreme fatigue for 5 days. After those symptoms subsided, she had nausea for another 10 days. She ended up in the ER where she was treated with IV fluids and medication. Our daughter had to miss school (she's in med school) due to being so ill and had to miss a major exam for which she had been studying for 6 weeks.  Our daughter had eaten nothing else other than the salad and smoothie from Clean Juice on the day she got ill. When I called the manager of the store to inform her of what happened, she immediately started defending herself. Needless to say, we'll never go to Clean Juice again.
Good drinks and fair price

From the minute I went up to order, my experience was excellent. The girls at the counter were super welcoming and friendly and invited me to come back with sincere kindness. I got the green bowl. It was not too sweet, but the bananas, granola and honey on top were a great finishing touch. They seem like a great company otherwise too. They had a jar on a counter for prayer intentions, and the girls told me they pray for all of the requests they receive. I added a request and enjoyed my smoothie bowl in the laid back and up beat, bright ambiance of the store. It was absolutely lovely!
I always love going in. Your products are great and super convenient to my office. An açaí bowl is my favorite lunch during the hot summer months. I tell everyone in Alpharetta about y’all!
Quality ingredients and great service.
Their juices are top quality.They are by far one of  the healthiest options around here for sure.
Great organic all natural protein shakes, and the açaí bowls are a must try!

Such a great place! I love the atmosphere, the food is amazing, the service is always great as well. Doug is the manager and he is extremely friendly and always brings such a positive energy to the store. My favorite juices are the orange and the green. Definitely get those when you go!
I love Clean Juice. It is wonderful that it is organic. My fav is the juice with cashew milk.

Genuinely, one of the best juice places I have ever been to (and trust me, I've been to a lot). They have super tasty juices and even tastier açaí bowls! Would totally recommend to anyone looking for a spot to grab some genuinely healthy meals. And the customer service is amazing!

If you're looking for healthier food options, Clean Juice Alpharetta is definitely the place. I frequent the Alpharetta location weekly. The service and attention  to detail is outstanding. I'm completely hooked on the Berry Bowl. There is a huge selection of fresh, organic and nutritious menu options. If you download the Clean Juice mobile app, you  can save time and order ahead.

Great healthy well being options. Juice, smoothie, bowl, cleansers and shots. Great variety of rich freshly made products. Courteous professional service. Dont forget their clean juice app for rewards. Very noticeable from parking. Clean, neat awedome place to get health boosted. Highly recommended.
We go here too much 😁, love this place.
This place is fantastic. The toast and acai bowls are phenomenal and the juice is always delicious too. The smoothies however lack flavor and I cannot recommend.
Super cute spot with great juice choices and friendly service. The juices arrived quickly and we're exactly what we ordered.
Download their app! Juice can be ready when you get there. You can even buy some to take home for later. I asked for a little extra ginger and she made it happen!

As a pretty devout juicer I REALLY appreciate more places where I can grab a fresh ORGANIC juice. This is one of those places. Really good menu, tasty food & juice, and friendly employees! If you download the app, you get a $5 credit, and can collect points toward a free juice.
Very fresh and place is nice and clean. Avo toast could use some flavor but overall good!

Everything here is pretty good. Staff is friendly. My only problem is it is VERY expensive. Two cold brew 16oz cashew milk coffee’s was $19+ 😮.  Also ate here right when they opened and thought the same thing so I have not been back to eat but I thought...how much could two coffee drinks be?!?

I love Clean Juice. Their smoothies, juices and all the bowls and bites are pretty tasty and the fact that it is all Organic is even better. My go-to smoothie for lunch is the Simple One and I can add-ons as many as I can. Their Avocado toast is my favorite one. People that work there are welcoming and very knowledgeable about the menu and ingredients. They do get pretty busy during lunch rush, if you don’t want to wait, order on their App and pick it up. I go here at least 2-3 times a week, this is a must try for anyone!
Delicious, healthy, and makes you feel awesome

Went here on a whim.  Saw the store and thought why not? Glad I did! I had the Mango Creme Protein shake. It was so fresh! And it didn’t have any sugary additives.  I added hemp to it. I have no idea what hemp tastes like but I’m a fan now! I’ll be back to try something else.
Organic, clean, the best.  Hands down.  I love that I can put fresh juice in my body of fruit grown on organic farms.  Try the hot shot.  An amazing immunity boost.

I signed up for a 5 day cleanse. To be honest, with work and the gym I shouldve opted for 3 days but you live and learn. Now the results were great. For the past few years my diet has been horrible due to my work schedule. The snowball effect has left me overweight, lazy, low energy, and brain fogged.  By the 3rd day of the juice cleanse, I really noticed an increase in brain activity, clearing up so much of that haze in my mind that I've had for the last 4 years. It motivated to go back to the gym and recharge and organize myself for a healthier lifestyle.  Dont overthink the juices. There are 6 a day. Juice 1 is a Sweet Green juice. May take some getting used to if youve never done green juices but I enjoyed it especially because of the added organic maple for flavoring. Juice 2 is Orange with oranges and carrots and its pretty tasty. Juice 3 is a Green juice but without the added sweet. Its fine. Most of the juices if nice and cold you can chug down in about 2 or 3 gulps if you really cant take the flavor. Juice 4, well Juice for being the exception. Man this was the hardest for me. Its Yellow and its an amazing lemonade with the addition of cayenne pepper flakes. Chugging is not as easy. And towards the end the cayanne builds up. But I liked that this juice deff felt like a cleanse boost and metabolism ignitor. Juice 5 was Red, a Beet inspired juice that was fine. Definitely do not recommend letting this one get cold at all. Then Juice 6, the creme de la creme, White. Its akin to a protein shake as its chasew milk based. It has cinnamon, maple, some Himalayan salt. Man, this thing makes all the other juices worth it. Its fatty, rich, and taste so good. It also makes you just feel rewarded for the day. All ingredients are labeled as organic.  The staff is friendly and helpful. They are open at 7 which helped me pick up my pack each day before work.  The price is going to be high for many people but the it beats a hospital bill. It's an investment on your health especially for those of us who have not given enough care throughout the years and allowed those things to compound. I say give it a try even if its the partial day or 1 day fast!

AMAZING!! This place is truly incredibly! Super fast service and the juiceristas go above and beyond. The food here is amazing and they even have gluten free bread that tastes so good you don’t even miss the gluten. WHATT!! By far my favorite place to get smoothies, juices and bowls. The ingredients are so fresh and they have several protein options for add-ins to your drink. Not to mention the decor is so aesthetically pleasing! 10/10 love it here! Also plenty of parking!
Second time in to try. Good product but very very slow to get served.  Took almost 20 minutes to get two smoothies.
Such a great atmosphere!! Love the smoothies and smoothie bowls!! Wonderful customer service!! Totally recommend this place. Can't wait to go back!!!💝😄

Great addition to Alpharetta. Best juice place in Atlanta and The only organic juice store. High quality ingredients that you can taste in every cold press juices and smoothies. Also the oats are great! Perfect for a healthy breakfast or snack. Will definitely come back as much as I can.
The Gold juice is delicious.  Better then Jus by Julie.
